title: Chronicles of the Canongate, 1st Series
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Worthy Mr. Piper, best of contractors who ever furnished four frampaljades for public use, I bless you when I set out on a journey myself;the neat coaches under your contract render the intercourse, fromJohnnie Groat's House to Ladykirk and Cornhill Bridge, safe, pleasant,and cheap.

title: The works of the Right Rev. John Sage,
author: Sage, John
snippet: The incumbent of Ladykirk was deposed for " having said that the Covenant was no better than a band of rebellion."

title: My first visit to Europe:
author: Dickinson, Andrew
snippet: At Ladykirk, near Berwick, is an old chapel built by James IV.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Worthy Mr Piper, best of contractors who everfurnished four frampal jades for public use, I blessyou when I set out on a journey myself; the neatcoaches under your contract render the intercourse,from Johnnie Groat's house to Ladykirk and Cornhil!Bridge, safe, pleasant, and cheap.
